titleStmt.title: The Tocharian Fragments in Or.15004, Or.15009 and Or.150010 of the Hoernle Collection
titleStmt.author: Tamai, Tatsushi

sourceDesc.p: Tatsushi Tamai, “The Tocharian Fragments in Or.15004, Or.15009 and Or.150010 of the Hoernle Collection,” in: Buddhist Manuscripts from Central Asia: The British Library Sanskrit Fragments, Volume II.1 (Texts), ed. by Seishi KARASHIMA and Klaus WILLE, Tokyo: The International Research Institute for Advanced Buddhology at Soka University, 2009, pp. 659-665.

encodingDesc.editorialDecl: Input and marked up by IRIAB.

head.p: This catalogue contains transliterations of Tocharian fragments in the Hoernle Collection at the British Library.

msItem.note: (old type of the script in Tocharian)

msItem.q:

msItem.title: Karmavācanā
msItem.note: cf. KaVā 97-103, SHT I 132, Or.15009/392 and H.149.add.50; cf. Hartmann/Wille 1992, p. 28; Toch. in italics; cf. Nagashima 2009: 156f.

msItem.title: Karmavācanā

msItem.note: notes of different scribes, among them one colophon
msItem.q:
a /// m. ntra t. ta sśa p[i] cā ti na v[ā] akṣ. vyā ..
                            ///
b /// ya ce postaK¨ˎ .ts. ṣarmire kalyā .. ///
c /// .ā sa .. [c]i .[p]amo • wi ṣarmiriśkaṃ [p]aiykār[e]
                            ///
d /// wate putt[a]rakṣite s[v]arna[ra] ///
e /// .. ti sa m. h. .. + .. + + + + + + .e .e ///

msItem.title: Daśottarasūtra
msItem.note: cf. Daśo E.b-I.10; cf. Hartmann/Wille, p. 28; cf. Jens-Uwe Hartmann, Untersuchungen zum Dīrghāgama der Sarvāstivādins, Göttingen 1992 p. 128 (unpublished Habilitationsschrift)
msItem.q:
a /// + + + + .v. .. suvyaṃjan. [k]. .. .. + .. .ū .. + +
                            ///
b /// + .. [ṇ]uta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi [k]uruta
                            bhāṣi[ṣ]y. ///
c /// + dālanam*ˎ daśottaro dharmaparyāyaḥ
                            katamaḥ eko + ///
d /// kāyagatā smṛtiḥ eko dharmaḥ
                            parijñeyaḥ {[nanāṣale]} sparśaḥ {[ta ..]} .[ā] + ///
e
                            /// + .. kāraḥ {[.. [tu]ne]} eko dharmo viśeṣabhāgīya {[wa ki pa ke ..]}
                            yoni[ś]o + + + + ///
f /// + + + ś cetovimuktiḥ {[pa v.]}
                            eko dharmo (’)bhijñeyaḥ sarv. {[.. sa na la [v]yo tu]} + + + + + ///
g /// + + + .i .. .ā [a]nan[y](a)thā bhū .ā .. .ā .. +
                            [n]ā + + + + + ///

msItem.title: Catuṣpariṣatsūtra
msItem.note: CPS 24a.4−14; ed. DĀ (UH) No. 34; cf. T.24, No. 1450, 131a19-b12; Toch. in italics; cf. Ye 2009(2): 229f.
msItem.q:
t /// + + .. + .. + + + + + ///
u /// + .vākāśyapo jaṭi ⃝///
v /// .. racirasya paryā {[lyak[u]Rˎ [y]ama]} ⃝ ///
w /// [l]. m idam avocat* ya {[kʷ[r]i tañ[ˎ]]} ⃝ ///
x /// + + ṅga tvaṃ kāśyapa an. ///
y /// + + [r]aṃ praviśya sva[y]. + ///
z /// + + + + + + + + + + ///

u /// + .. + + + + + + ///
v /// .. na n. .. + + + + ///
w /// [hā]ti saṅgam(*ˎ) [c]w. + ///
x /// [ce]Uˎ oro[cc]e kere[kau](na) ///
y /// .. naṃ : na nikete [r]. + ///
z /// + (k)erekauna ri .. + ///

msItem.title: Varṇārhavarṇastotra
msItem.note: Mātṛceṭa, Varṇārhavarṇastotra, cf. VAV(UH) 2.2-5; Skt./Toch. bilingual; cf. Fukita 2009; foilo 48
msItem.q:
tām eva • tawaKˎ • ātmagata • āñme ///
sākṣād iva • yneś ramT*ˎ • karomi • ◯ ///
te • ciśco 2 || asarvavit*ˎ • mā ◯ ///
svayaṃviditamāhātmyavistarā .. ///

msItem.title: Varṇārhavarṇastotra
msItem.q:
[ś]co 3 || ayam*ˎ • se • evaṃvidhaś ca • .. ///
neccepi • sā • sāU*ˎ • yaś ca • kʷse ◯ ///
maḥ wināṢṢAlñe • astu • tā ◯ ///
yād[ṛ]śāḥ kʷce tasemanecci • tvādṛ[ś]. ///

msItem.title: Karmavācanā
msItem.note: Karmavācanā, cf. KaVā 97-103, SHT I 132, Or.15009/87 and H.149.add.50; cf. Hartmann/Wille 1992, p. 28
msItem.q:
A1 /// .. yaṃ navakānāṃ atha vā ayaṃ ///
A2 /// .. te weṃ wa[t]e trite ma ○ ///
A3 /// (āyu)ṣmaṃ evaṃnāmā bhikṣu ○ ///
A4 /// (samavahi)ta(ḥ) saṃmukhībhūtasya ○ ///
A5 /// (mamā)yatu adhiti[ṣ]ṭhatu • ev[a] + + ///

msItem.title: Karmavācanā
msItem.q:
B1 /// .y. yāvad eva laghujīvi[t]. + + ///
B2 /// .ā mama iya tāva ○ ///
B3 /// .. vat*ˎ dvir api tṛr api ○ ///
B4 /// + .. te weṣle yototRA mā ○ ///
B5 /// + (kā)lagata tasya yāvad eva l(a)[ghu] ///

msItem.note: ed. G. Melzer, 2006, Teil I, p. 80.

msItem.note: on verso the Upasenasūtra starts, cf. Hartmann/Wille 1992, p. 48.

msItem.title: Udānavarga
msItem.note: cf. Uv 5.27a-6.9a; Toch. text after chapter 5; Skt. text ed. by Karashima 2009: 337
msItem.q:

                            + ///
